pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, June 28, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, June 28, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the welcoming ceremony for the President of Italy, Sergio Mattarella.

Rotunda
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

9:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Italy.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

Toronto, Ontario

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of Ontario, Kathleen Wynne, the Mayor of Toronto, John Tory, and the President and CEO of Waterfront Toronto, Will Fleissig. A media availability will follow.

Port Lands
20 Polson Street
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:45 p.m.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Federation of Black Canadians.

Closed to media.


Media Appearance

An interview with the Prime Minister for 1320 AM CHMB Vancouver will air at 8:00 a.m. PST.
